name: E-commerce Website
desc: A fully functional e-commerce platform featuring product listings, shopping cart, and checkout system. Built using Java, XML, and Firebase.

name: CRUD Operations Application
desc: A web-based CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application that demonstrates database management and dynamic content updates using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

name: Gemini Website
desc: An interactive website that integrates AI-powered features through the Gemini API. Built with React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: GYM Website (Version 1)
desc: A responsive fitness website showcasing gym services, class schedules, and membership plans. Designed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: GYM Website (Version 2)
desc: An upgraded version of the GYM website with modern UI/UX and smooth animations. Built using React.js and Bootstrap.

name: Travel Landing Page
desc: A beautifully designed landing page for a travel agency featuring destination highlights and call-to-action sections. Created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Sign Design Website (Version 1)
desc: A creative portfolio website for a sign design studio, focusing on visual presentation and brand identity. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Sign Design Website (Version 2)
desc: An enhanced version of the Sign Design website with improved layout and animations for a modern user experience. Developed with React.js.

name: Sign Design Website (Version 3)
desc: A final polished version of the Sign Design portfolio, featuring responsive design, smooth transitions, and contact integration. Built with React.js and Tailwind CSS.

name: Scraping Fotball Data
desc: A Python project that scrapes football data from various sports websites using BeautifulSoup and requests libraries, storing the data in a structured format for analysis.

name: Scraping boxing news Data
desc: A web scraping project that collects the latest boxing news articles from multiple sources using Python's BeautifulSoup and requests libraries, organizing the information for easy access.

name: Cookies Clicker Game With Selenium
desc: A fun automation project that uses Selenium to play the popular Cookies Clicker game, demonstrating web automation techniques with Python.
